CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( Source__c) , '1', IF(Account.IsPersonAccount, Account.FirstName + ' ' + Account.LastName, Account.Name), '2', ComplainerFirstName__c + ' ' + ComplainerLastName__c, '3', CASE( TEXT( InstitutionType__c), '1', 'FA', '2', 'ČNB', '3', 'MF ČR', '4', 'ČSOB', ''), '4', ComplainerContractor__r.FirstName + ' ' + ComplainerContractor__r.LastName, '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Detailed description of the claim source
CustomField.label: Source Description
